question: 1 if a woman has to make istinjah as normal when she is on her monthly period ... 2. when you pray awwabeen (salat after magrib) do you do that without talking to anyone, is that important, because i have children and they talk to me/ask me things after magrib
answer:
QUESTION

1 if a woman has to make istinjah as normal when she is on her monthly period

2. when you pray awwabeen (salat after magrib) do you do that without talking to anyone, is that important, because i have children and they talk to me/ask me things after magrib salat

 

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

 

1.       It is masnoon to do istinjah with normal water after using the toilet whether one is in the state of menstruation cycle (period) or  not.

(Behashti zewar, Vol 2, Pg8, maktabah tahanwi, deoband)

2.         Talking between maghrib and awwabeen salah does not effect the awwabeen salah.

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

 

Ml. Abdur Rahman Shareef,
Student Dārul Iftā
